page.title: 17A day in my life in Insch.
page.content: A get up aboot acht an' pit oan ma claes.A hae m' brakfist--gie aften a bowel o' cornflakes,toast an' a cup o' tae. Sine a wash an'get ready for skweel at half by nine. The bell's rung,intae the sums till elivin! Playtime's ower,we're intae English,an aefter that it's denner time. A winner fit's for denner? A seen fin oot_ stovies an' breid an', ginger sponge for puddin'. In the aefterneen ere's games an' A play netba or playtime.For the himist 'oor an' a quaarter we wirk on wir project.A ging up tae ma' pals an' we clim the aul pine tae see if ere's ony cones, bit ere's nane.So we play wi' wir skates.M' supper's at sax an' A ging tae m' bed at nine. (TRANSLATION ON PAGE 18)
